pullrequest.title: Logical camera now reports nested models

content.raw: Currently the doxygen says `return models that are visible.. etc` but this function has a `void` return type. I think we can clarify in `\brief` to say that this function adds visible models to the msg that will be published by this sensor. Alternatively, expand the function name to something like `AddVisibleModelsToMsg`
content.html: Currently the doxygen says return models that are visible.. etc but this function has a void return type. I think we can clarify in \brief to say that this function adds visible models to the msg that will be published by this sensor. Alternatively, expand the function name to something like AddVisibleModelsToMsg
